data.title: Archdiocese of Philadelphia
data.text:
Church Restroom: Facilities adapted for wheelchair users. Restroom has proper door size, enlarged stall, grab bars, clearance space, accessible fixtures and sink.

Parish Meeting Room/Hall: Accessible entrances, parking, curb cuts and ramps to accessible entrances and restroom facilities adapted for wheelchair users for at least one meeting room.

American Sign Language: Weekly or monthly Liturgies are interpreted. The sign language interpreter is provided on a regular basis or your church is used for Masses in which the priest signs in American Sign Language. Click here for times and locations of Masses in American Sign Language

Montgomery Cty. Line Rd. from Orvilla Rd.; to CONRAIL line; along CONRAIL line to Cowpath Rd. (Rt. 463); along Rt. 463 to Bethlehem Pk. (Rt. 309); along Rt. 309 to DeKalb Pk. (Rt. 202); to Hancock St.; to North Wales Rd.; to Mill Rd.; to Dickerson Rd.; to Wissahickon Rd.; to Church Rd.; then by air line to Allentown Rd. at Broad Rd.; to Towamencin Twp. line, Welsh Rd.; to Orvilla Rd., to Montgomery County line.
